snippet.title: 007 Legends Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
007 Legends Gameplay Trailer. One Bond. 6 missions. Mission 1 : Moonraker. A secret space station. A terrifying weapon. A sinister enemy...
Check the first trailer of Skyfall, the new James Bond movie ! : 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pcM7sqNUmnY&feature=plcp

007 Legends Gameplay Trailer. The game will be available on PS3 and Xbox 360 on october 16, 2012. Suscribe now to get the forthcoming trailers, gameplay trailers and videos !
